javadoc: Listener interface for notification when the top of screen position changes.

methods.name: viewChanged
methods.comment: Notifies the listener that the top of the screen has changed position.

params.name: fp
params.comment: the field panel whose view changed.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index of the layout at the top of the screen

name: ViewListener
comment: Listener interface for notification when the top of screen position changes.
